actions: Assists the Heart Yang, warms and facilitates the flow of Yang Qi in the chest, unblocks Yang, transforms Qi and thin mucus and warms and facilitates the flow of Qi through the channels and collaterals and Blood through the vessels.
With Gan Cao, for palpitations and shortness of breath due to injured Yang of the chest.
Tonifies the Spleen, augments Qi, moderates spasms and alleviates pain.

syndromes: Deficient Qi due to excessive sweating with palpitations that respond favorably to pressure on the chest.

manifestations.tongue: Pale and moist maybe clear bubbles on the surface
manifestations.pulse: Deep and feeble with a possible cotton-like sensation between the skin and wall of the vessel
